code: @Test public void testSelectOne() throws Exception {     MockEndpoint mock = getMockEndpoint("mock:result").     mock.expectedMessageCount(1).     mock.message(0).body().isEqualTo(TEST_ACCOUNT_ID_BAD).     mock.message(0).header(TEST_CASE_OUTPUT_HEADER_NAME).isInstanceOf(Account.class).     template.sendBodyAndHeader("direct:start", TEST_ACCOUNT_ID_BAD, TEST_CASE_INPUT_HEADER_NAME, TEST_ACCOUNT_ID).     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied().
